name: Forward Inc
description:
Description 

After months of arduous job-searching, Bob has finally landed himself a position at Forward Inc! It seems that things are finally looking up for dear Bob ... but little does he know how difficult his work will be, and how demanding of a character that his future boss is. Follow Bob's journey to survive his office days and become the greatest employee ever in Forward Inc., the game!

Controls 
  • Mouse - Select 
  • Esc Key - Pause
Credits

Forward Inc is a game developed by INB0X, a 3-member team of high school students from Jakarta State High School 21's Class of 2022 whom are named as follows:

  • Adeline Charlotte Augustine
  • Astrid Maysa Zafira
  • Ivan Setiawan

The game was originally conceived as an entry for the Mage 7 Game Dev Competition in 2021, themed "forward". Unfortunately, the game did not achieve any awards, although team INB0X had then successfully made it to the semi-final rounds.

Music by Eric Matyas.

SFX by Kenney.
